alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:35PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN LEE COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 635 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buckingham, or near Lehigh Acres, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, San Carlos Park, McGregor, East Dunbar, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Olga, Southwest Florida Airport, Cypress Lake, Buckingham, Villas, Three Oaks, Whiskey Creek, Fort Myers Shores, Page Park, Page Field Airport, Alva, and Fort Myers Villas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
